name: Early Care and After School Enrichment
description: Calvary offers early and extended care 5-days a week throughout the school year. Our Early Care program starts at 8:00 am until our regular school day at 8:30 am. Our After School Enrichment Program extends your child’s day until 1:30, 3:00 or 4:00pm. Children participate in special small group projects, games, and enrichment activities such as Spanish, cooking, art, kindergarten club, and science.

howToGetIt: All the steps for admissions are located online at https://www.calvarynurseryschoolsf.org/admissions. For more information call or email office.
cost: This is a fee based service. Sliding scale is available with verified income requirements.
